section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 74-1106, United States against Washington for a reason stated in the opinion of the Court filed this morning, the judgment of the District of Columbia Court of Appeals is reversed and the cases remanded for further proceedings not inconsistent with this opinion.
In this case, Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice Marshall, joining him, had filed a dissenting opinion.
